# New Project Setup Template

 - [ ] Issue title is "Project Setup - Project Code" (e.g. `Project Setup - 0273ABC03`)

## Summary Information

**Client Name:** `ABC Health System`

**Client Code:** `0273ABC`

**Project Description:** `Care Coordinator Report and Cost Model Dashboard for ABC MSSP Population`

## Check to ensure the following items are present under the client folder

 - [ ] A purchase order or e-mail notification
 - [ ] Verify a conflict check within last year is in the client folder in this repository (if stale, open a pull request to capture an updated conflict check)

## Perform the following setup tasks

 - [ ] Request a project level risk assessment to be completed for non-basic collaborative members using [this template](https://indy-github.milliman.com/raw/PRM/client-and-project-documentation/master/templates/project_risk_level.txt) (must be a Principal)
 - [ ] Create a project repository in an appropriate home (likely [NYHealth-Production](https://indy-github.milliman.com/NYHealth-Production) (if needed)
 - [ ] Create the standard network folders for this project using [this template](https://indy-github.milliman.com/PRM/client-and-project-documentation/tree/master/templates/3.001-0123ABC02)
 - [ ] Rename the `RENAME_TO_PROJECT_DESCRIPTION.txt` file in the root of the project network folders.

 **Basic only collaborative members are assumed to be Risk Level 2B by default**
